sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Store, FileText, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, TrendingUp, Calendar, MapPin, Clock, Star, Award, Target, Activity, Utensils, ShieldCheck, Camera, Users, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const stats = [ { name: 'Food Establishments', value: '2,847', change: '+12%', changeType: 'increase', icon: Store, color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { name: 'Safety Programs', value: '47', change: '+3', changeType: 'increase', icon: ShieldCheck, color: 'bg-green-500' }, { name: 'Pending Inspections', value: '23', change: '-5', changeType: 'decrease', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-yellow-500' }, { name: 'Safety Compliance', value: '94.2%', change: '+2.1%', changeType: 'increase', icon: CheckCircle, color: 'bg-purple-500' } ]; const recentInspections = [ { id: 1, establishment: 'Golden Palace Restaurant', location: 'Mumbai Central', status: 'Completed', date: '2024-01-15', inspector: 'Rajesh Kumar', findings: 'Minor temperature control issues', rating: 'B+', photos: 8 }, { id: 2, establishment: 'Fresh Foods Mart', location: 'Pune Station Road', status: 'In Progress', date: '2024-01-12', inspector: 'Priya Sharma', findings: 'Under inspection', rating: 'Pending', photos: 12 }, { id: 3, establishment: 'Spice Garden Cafe', location: 'Nashik Highway', status: 'Completed', date: '2024-01-10', inspector: 'Amit Patel', findings: 'Excellent hygiene standards', rating: 'A', photos: 15 } ]; const alerts = [ { id: 1, type: 'warning', message: 'High number of food safety violations in Thane district', time: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, type: 'info', message: 'New food license renewals deadline approaching', time: '4 hours ago' }, { id: 3, type: 'success', message: 'Monthly food safety report generated successfully', time: '1 day ago' } ]; const quickActions = [ { title: 'New Inspection', description: 'Start a new food safety inspection', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-blue-500', href: '/audit' }, { title: 'Manage Establishments', description: 'View and manage food establishments', icon: Store, color: 'bg-green-500', href: '/establishments' }, { title: 'Safety Programs', description: 'Track food safety programs', icon: ShieldCheck, color: 'bg-purple-500', href: '/programs' }, { title: 'Generate Reports', description: 'Create inspection reports', icon: TrendingUp, color: 'bg-orange-500', href: '/reports' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Food Safety Dashboard

Department of Food Safety - Monitoring and Evaluation System

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (
{stat.changeType === 'increase' ? '↗' : '↘'}

{stat.name}

{stat.value}

{stat.change} from last month
); })}
{/* Recent Inspections */}

Recent Inspections

{recentInspections.map((inspection) => (

{inspection.establishment}

{inspection.location}

{inspection.photos} photos uploaded

{inspection.status} {inspection.rating !== 'Pending' && ( {inspection.rating} )}

{inspection.date}

))}
{/* Alerts & Notifications */}

Alerts & Notifications

{alerts.map((alert) => (
{alert.type === 'warning' ? : alert.type === 'info' ? : }

{alert.message}

{alert.time}

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default Dashboard;
